text: Old Street station is a central London National Rail and London Underground station. It is at the junction of Old Street and City Road. This is just north of the City of London. It is on the border between the boroughs of Islington and Hackney. The station is in Travelcard Zone 1. ==References== ==Other websites== * for Old Street station from National Rail * London Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** * Category:Northern line stations Category:Railway stations in the London Borough of Islington Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Islington Category:Transport in the London Borough of Hackney Category:Railway stations served by First Capital Connect Category:1901 establishments in England Category:1904 establishments in England
title: Old Street station
